message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm still willing to work with you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $110. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings. What do you think?
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $110. I'm willing to go up to $95, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're still looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $105. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the value the product brings. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $105. I'm willing to go up to $92, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider this offer?

I'm not willing to go as low as $92, Bob. I think I've already compromised enough. I'm willing to make one more offer, and that's $100. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings. If you're not willing to meet me at $100, I'll have to consider other options.
